steps.name: Checking that input "Email" has a value "user.name@gmail.com"
Checking that input "Username" has a value "username"
Checking that input "Password" has a value "password"
Set file "testdata/files/image.png" to the file input "Upload input"
Checking that icon "Info icon" is visible
Checking that text "Info title" is visible
Checking that text "Info title" has text "Tap on "Upload image" button to select file"
Checking that text "Info description" is visible
Checking that text "Info description" has text "Recommended file size 540X300"
Checking that button "Upload button" is visible
Checking that button "Remove button" is visible
Checking that input "Input" has a value "Playwright"
Fill input "Estimated time input" to value "2 weeks"
Checking that input "Estimated time input" has a value "2 weeks"
Checking that textarea "Textarea" has a value "Playwright"
Fill input "Max score input" to value "100"
Checking that input "Max score input" has a value "100"
Fill input "Min score input" to value "10"
Checking that input "Min score input" has a value "10"
Check visible courses list toolbar view
Checking that button "Create button" is visible
Check visible course view at index "0"
Checking that text "Max score text" is visible
Checking that text "Max score text" has text "Max score: 100"
Checking that text "Min score text" is visible
Checking that text "Min score text" has text "Min score: 10"
Checking that text "Estimated time text" is visible
Checking that text "Estimated time text" has text "Estimated time: 2 weeks"
Open course menu at index "0" and click edit
Checking that button "Edit menu item" is visible
Checking that input "Input" has a value "New Playwright"
Fill input "Estimated time input" to value "3 weeks"
Checking that input "Estimated time input" has a value "3 weeks"
Checking that textarea "Textarea" has a value "New Playwright"
Fill input "Max score input" to value "1000"
Checking that input "Max score input" has a value "1000"
Fill input "Min score input" to value "100"
Checking that input "Min score input" has a value "100"
Check visible courses list toolbar view
Checking that button "Create button" is visible
Check visible course view at index "0"
Checking that text "Title" has text "New Playwright"
Checking that text "Max score text" is visible
Checking that text "Max score text" has text "Max score: 1000"
Checking that text "Min score text" is visible
Checking that text "Min score text" has text "Min score: 100"
Checking that text "Estimated time text" is visible
Checking that text "Estimated time text" has text "Estimated time: 3 weeks"
